describe: Morocco, located in North Africa, is known for its rich cultural heritage, diverse landscapes ranging from the Sahara Desert to the Atlas Mountains, and vibrant cities. It is a country where ancient traditions blend with modern influences.

cities.name: üèî Marrakech
cities.geographical_location: Located in the western part of Morocco, near the foothills of the Atlas Mountains.
cities.climate: Marrakech has a semi-arid climate with hot summers and mild winters.

cities.name: üèù Casablanca
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the Atlantic coast in the central-western part of Morocco.
cities.climate: Casablanca has a Mediterranean climate with warm, dry summers and mild, wet winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Harira soup, seafood dishes, and briouats.

cities.name: üåÜ Fes
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northeastern part of Morocco.
cities.climate: Fes experiences a Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and cool, wet winters.

cities.name: üèî Chefchaouen
cities.geographical_location: Nestled in the Rif Mountains in the northwest of Morocco.
cities.climate: Chefchaouen has a Mediterranean climate with mild, wet winters and warm, dry summers.
